phaseDescription: General-purpose tools, utilities, and frameworks that span multiple phases or don't fit into specific categories.

tools.toolDescription: Cross-platform command-line shell and scripting language for automation and administration.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Starts the PowerShell interactive shell.

tools.toolDescription: Multipurpose relay for bidirectional data transfer between two independent data channels.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Creates a TCP relay from port 8080 to 192.168.1.100:80.

tools.toolDescription: Versatile networking tool for port scanning, banner grabbing, and basic connectivity testing.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Listens for incoming connections on port 4444.

tools.toolDescription: Windows Management Instrumentation client for remote system administration.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Lists running processes on the remote system.

tools.toolDescription: Wireless attack tool for testing wireless networks and access points.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Performs deauthentication attack on channel 6.

tools.toolDescription: Software-defined radio tool for analyzing and manipulating radio signals.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Launches the Chirp software-defined radio tool.

tools.toolDescription: Deepmagic Information Gathering Tool for comprehensive reconnaissance.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Performs comprehensive reconnaissance on the target domain.

tools.toolDescription: Takes screenshots of websites and generates a report for web application reconnaissance.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Takes screenshots of websites from the URL list.

tools.toolDescription: Digital forensics platform and graphical interface to The Sleuth Kit for forensic analysis.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Launches the Autopsy digital forensics platform.

tools.toolDescription: Complete framework for reverse-engineering and analyzing binaries.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Analyzes the binary with automatic analysis.

tools.toolDescription: 32-bit assembler level analyzing debugger for Windows reverse engineering.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Launches the OllyDbg debugger.

tools.toolDescription: Pattern matching engine for malware researchers and security analysts.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Scans the file using the specified YARA rules.

tools.toolDescription: Python-based interactive packet manipulation program for network analysis.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Starts the Scapy interactive packet manipulation tool.

tools.toolDescription: Network intrusion detection and prevention system for monitoring network traffic.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Starts Snort IDS on the specified interface.

tools.toolDescription: Note-taking application for organizing findings during security engagements.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Launches the KeepNote application.

tools.toolDescription: GUI tool for organizing scan results and generating reports.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Launches the MagicTree application.

tools.toolDescription: Web-based platform for collaboration and generating structured penetration test reports.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Starts the Dradis server.

tools.toolDescription: Generates customizable Word reports from JSON findings and templates.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Creates a report using the specified template and findings.

tools.toolDescription: Penetration testing report generation and collaboration tool.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Starts the Serpico server.

tools.toolDescription: GUI-based tool for visualizing relationships between entities through data mining and transforms.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Starts the Maltego application.

tools.toolDescription: Comprehensive web application security testing platform.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Starts the Burp Suite application.

tools.toolDescription: Damn Vulnerable Web Application for learning web security and testing tools.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Starts the DVWA web application.

tools.toolDescription: Hunt for social media accounts by username across social networks.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Searches for the username across multiple social media platforms.

tools.toolDescription: Wordlist generator for creating custom wordlists for brute-force attacks.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Generates 8-character wordlist with custom pattern.

tools.toolDescription: Custom word list generator that spiders a given URL to create targeted wordlists.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Generates wordlist from the target website.

tools.toolDescription: HTTP DoS testing tool for web applications and load testing.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Performs HTTP DoS attack on the target.

tools.toolDescription: Identifies different types of hashes used to encrypt data and passwords.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Starts the hash identification tool.

tools.toolDescription: Steganography tool for hiding data in images and audio files.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Embeds secret.txt into image.jpg.

tools.toolDescription: Firmware analysis tool for extracting embedded files and executable code.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Analyzes the firmware file for embedded files.

tools.toolDescription: Data recovery tool for recovering files based on their headers and footers.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Recovers files from the disk image.

tools.toolDescription: Changes the MAC address of network interfaces for anonymity.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Randomizes the MAC address of eth0 interface.

tools.toolDescription: Rootkit detection tool for Linux systems to identify compromised systems.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Scans the system for rootkits.

tools.toolDescription: Rootkit, backdoor, sniffer and exploit scanner for system integrity checks.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Performs a comprehensive rootkit scan.

tools.toolDescription: Security scanner and logger for Unix systems to identify security issues.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Runs the Tiger security scanner.

tools.toolDescription: Security Auditor's Research Assistant for vulnerability assessment and security auditing.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Starts the SARA security scanner.

tools.toolDescription: Semi-automated network penetration testing tool for comprehensive security assessments.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Launches the Legion penetration testing tool.

tools.toolDescription: Cloud security assessment tool for AWS, Azure, and GCP environments.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Starts the Above cloud security assessment tool.

tools.toolDescription: Fast vulnerability scanner based on simple YAML based templates for automated security testing.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Scans the target URL for vulnerabilities.

tools.toolDescription: Windows password cracker based on rainbow tables for password recovery.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Launches the Ophcrack password recovery tool.

tools.toolDescription: WPA-PSK dictionary attack tool for wireless network security testing.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Performs dictionary attack on WPA-PSK network.

tools.toolDescription: WPS PIN recovery tool for attacking WPS-enabled wireless networks.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Attacks the WPS PIN of the specified access point.

tools.toolDescription: Bluetooth security testing tool for discovering and exploiting Bluetooth devices.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Attacks the specified Bluetooth device.

tools.toolDescription: Command-line WebDAV client for Unix systems to access WebDAV servers.

toolCommands.commandDescription: Connects to the WebDAV server.
